description: Examples of forbidden vocabulary and pushy sales tactics to avoid

bad_examples.statement: Our solution is the best on the market and I guarantee you'll see results within 30 days.
bad_examples.why_bad: Superlative claims without evidence, guarantee that can't be backed up

bad_examples.statement: This is a great deal and we can only offer it today - it's a limited time exclusive offer.
Trust me, this is exactly what you need. Our industry-leading platform is a game-changer.
bad_examples.why_bad: Asking for trust instead of earning it, buzzwords without substance

bad_examples.statement: Honestly, this is the most incredible, revolutionary solution you'll find. Believe me.
Our cutting-edge, best-in-class technology is guaranteed to transform your business.

why_forbidden: These phrases trigger skepticism in sophisticated buyers, signal inexperience, and create adversarial dynamics. They tell instead of ask, claim instead of demonstrate.
